thread.title: Watch Adele's Video for Her New Song, 'Hello"
thread.title_full: Watch Adele's Video for Her New Song, 'Hello" | Maxim

author: Kelly McClure
title: Watch Adele's Video for Her New Song, 'Hello"
text:
Fans of Adele (of which there are a slew) have had to wait nearly five years for a new album from her since 2011's dip in the well of emotions, 21 , wowed critics and casual listeners alike. Next month we'll see her return with 25 , and if this video for "Hello" off of it is any indication, it's gonna be a real heart-wrencher.
The last in a trilogy of albums titled by age, Adele described this one as being a "make-up" record. She wrote a message about it on her Facebook page .
25 features songs by Bruno Mars, Danger Mouse, and Tobias Jesso Jr and is set to come out on November 20.
